text: وَلَا يَصُدُّنَّكَ عَنۡ ءَايَٰتِ ٱللَّهِ بَعۡدَ إِذۡ أُنزِلَتۡ إِلَيۡكَۖ وَٱدۡعُ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَۖ وَلَا تَكُونَنَّ مِنَ ٱلۡمُشۡرِكِينَ

translation.en: And never let them avert you from the verses of Allah after they have been revealed to you. And invite [people] to your Lord. And never be of those who associate others with Allah
translation.id: dan jangan sampai mereka menghalang-halangi engkau (Muhammad) untuk (menyampaikan) ayat-ayat Allah, setelah ayat-ayat itu diturunkan kepadamu, dan serulah (manusia) agar (beriman) kepada Tuhanmu, dan janganlah engkau termasuk orang-orang musyrik
